snippet: The first test between Australia and India has been postponed to allow his team mates to mourn the death of Phillip Hughes at his funeral on Wednesday, Cricket Australia (CA) said on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: India Test Postponed After Hughes Funeral Set
headline.main: India Test Postponed After Hughes Funeral Set

lead_paragraph: The first test between Australia and India has been postponed to allow his team mates to mourn the death of Phillip Hughes at his funeral on Wednesday, Cricket Australia (CA) said on Saturday.
